# cipherSuites(_:)

**Instance Method**

Set TLS ciphersuites to the set of enabled ciphersuites.

## Declaration

```swift
func cipherSuites(_ suites: [tls_ciphersuite_t]) -> TLS
```

## Parameters

- **suites**: The cipher suites to set.
title: cipherSuites(_:)
